column2: "Na Moses poon Israelmba mboanofo no nyinara hyiae
column4: Nsɛm a EWURADZE ahyɛ dɛ hom nyɛ nye yi."

column3: na da a otsia esuon no nyɛ da krɔnkrɔn mma hom
column4: ahomgyeda pa mma EWURADZE: obiara a ɔbɛyɛ edwuma biara wɔ mu no woboku no."

column2: "Mma hom nnsɔ gya wɔ hom tsenabea nyinara ahomgyeda no."
"Na Moses kasaa kyerɛɛ Israelmba mboanofo no nyinara dɛ
column3: Iyi nye dza EWURADZE hyɛe no
column6: "Hom nyiyi ayɛyɛdze wɔ hom mu mma EWURADZE: obiara a n'akoma pɛ no

column2: "nye nguannyin nwoma a wɔahyɛ no memen

column3: nye ɔserango no nye ɔhyeweduhuam no ho nduhuam;"
nye nsisimu abo a wɔdze besisi asɔfontar egugudo no nye akatabo no mu."

column2: "Na wɔmma hom mu onyansafo biara mbra
column3: na ɔmbɛhyɛ dza EWURADZE ahyɛ nyinara;"

column5: nye ɔhyeweduhuam no nye ntamadan abow no
nye dampan no n'abotsen ano nkataano no:"

column3: wɔdze som wɔ bea krɔnkrɔn no
column4: ɔsɔfo Aaron ne ntar krɔnkrɔn no
column5: nye ne mbabanyin hɔn ntar a wɔdze bedzi asɔfo no."

column2: "Na Israelmba mboanofo no nyinara fii Moses enyim kɔree."

column3: obiara a n'akoma maa no do
column4: nye obiara a no sunsum kaa no no
column5: na wɔdze EWURADZE ayɛyɛdze no baa dɛ wɔmfa nyɛ ehyiadzibuw no
column6: nye no ho som ndzɛmba nyinara

column4: dodow a hɔn akoma pɛ nyinara
column9: sika edwindzi ahorow nyinara bae; mekyerɛ nyimpa biara a ɔpɛɛ dɛ ɔdze sika ayɛyɛdze bɔ afɔr ma EWURADZE."

column2: "Na nyimpa biara a ne nsamu wɔ bibir nye ɔberdum
column6: nye nguannyin nwoma a wɔahyɛ no memen

column2: "Obiara a ɔbɔɔ dwetɛ nye boran ayɛyɛdze afɔr no ɔdze EWURADZE ayɛyɛdze no bae: na nyimpa biara a ne nsamu wɔ akeesia dua a wɔdze bɛyɛ som edwuma no biara no
"Na mbaa a wɔwɔ nyansa akoma nyinara wɔdze hɔn nsa toow asaaba
column3: na wɔdze dza wɔtowee no bae

column2: "Na mbaa a hɔn akoma kenyaan hɔn wɔ nyansa mu nyinara toow mpɔnkyenhwi no."

column3: nye nsisimu abo a wɔdze besisi egugudo no

column2: "Israelmba no dze ayamuyi ayɛyɛdze brɛɛ EWURADZE; ɔbanyin nye ɔbaa biara a hɔn akoma maa hɔn do dɛ wɔmfa edwuma nyinara a EWURADZE nam Moses ne nsa do hyɛɛ dɛ wɔnyɛ no no ho biribi mbra no a."

column6: Hur ba no a ofi Juda ebusuakuw mu no ne dzin afrɛ no:"

column2: "na ɔdze Nyankopɔn sunsum ahyɛ no ma
"na ɔdze aadwen ne tsir mu edzi sika
"Na ɔdze ahyɛ n'akoma mu dɛ ɔmfa nkyerɛkyerɛ
column5: Ahisamak ne babanyin no a ofi Dan ebusuakuw mu no

column2: "Hɔn na ɔdze akoma mu nyansa ahyɛ hɔn ma
column11: mekyerɛ hɔn a wodzi edwin biara
column12: nye hɔn a wɔdwen hɔn tsir mu dzi edwin horow."
